name: Exp60 d
author: Christian Schulze
notes:
### Why
I want a 60% with arrow keys layout, but without tradeoffs like:
- 1.75U forward slash / question mark / shift combo key
- 2U left shift

### Design Considersations
- Has dedicated arrow keys
- Fits universal 60% cases
- Standard 2.25U left shift key (DZ60)
- Standard 1U forward slash / question mark key (DZ64)
- 6.25 space bars are too large for this design. 2.25 space bars are easier to source and often come with gmk sets or as spacebar kits.

### Function Key Export for TMK Keymap Generator (http://tkg.io/)
```
"0":["ACTION_LAYER_MOMENTARY",1],"1":["ACTION_MODS_TAP_KEY","LR_LEFT",["MOD_CTL"],"KC_ESCAPE"],"2":["ACTION_MODS","LR_LEFT",["MOD_CTL","MOD_SFT","MOD_ALT","MOD_GUI"]]
```
